name: Pomerium Ecosystem Token
description: Pomerium is web3 game studio. Pomerium developes independent games with original contents and provides the services, such as web3 utility service tools interacting with the games and publishing. Above all, our goal is to build sustainable token economy of Pomerium. Pomerium is not only providing game services, but also the best experience for web3 gamers through combining every fragmented utilities together on Pomerium. PMG can be earned as Pomerium Ecosystem token via Pomerium Guardians and used in Pomerium Ecosystem.
